title: (x) Siemens corporate faces - Siemens Serif & Sans {Jan E}
content:
Hello all.

Any ideas? Working on a corporate re-branding with work, anyone know what this serif and sans serif is?  
Many thanks in advance...

Rez x

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [STUDIOVIEW\_SAMPLE 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212016/http:/typophile.com/files/STUDIOVIEW_SAMPLE%202.jpg) | 172.02 KB |
| [STUDIOVIEW\_SAMPLE 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212016/http:/typophile.com/files/STUDIOVIEW_SAMPLE%201_0.jpg) | 61.93 KB |

 [‹ Need Help](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212016/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44484 "Go to previous forum topic") [please help to identify Communications ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212016/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44478 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Rez Oo

comments.content:
The serif is FF Meta Serif. (available at fontshop.com)

[EDIT] - upon closer inspection I actually think it’s not.

Are both samples from Siemens-related stuff?

Cause I think it’s [Siemens Sans and Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708212016/http:/www.urwpp.de/cgi-bin1/dalcgi/source/schnellsuche.htd?searchchar=Siemens)  
.

A typeface that’s been created for them?  
Ill look into it...

Thanks for your input.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Rez
